system.description: Wild and savage. They distrust magic of all kinds and put their faith in themselves before others. Always at the front of a battle, Berserkers love the sport of combat and don't like missile weapons. Not reliable as guards as they are too distracted and are rarely very intelligent. If you are a Berserker be larger than life, brash, not too bright and stupidly brave.

overview.base: You are @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resistant} to all @L[Category:Conjured spells]{conjured} @L[Category:Missile delivery spells]{Missile Spells}.
You are @L[Keyword:Resistant]{resistant} to all @L[Property:Ranged]{ranged} @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons}.

You can passively smell the types of all living creatures within 30 feet. You can detect dead and undead creatures as well, but you cannot distinguish within or between them. They all smell like death. You also gain @L[Ability:Scent Seeing]{Scent Seeing}. You can not detect @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless} creatures in this way.

You are an @L[Keyword:Expertise]{expert} @L[Tradecraft:Tracker]{tracker}. Additionally, you @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} being @L[Core:Surprise Rounds]{surprised} outside towns and other urban areas.

system.requirements: You are outside towns and other urban areas.

overview.base: You know the exact location of all target creatures. You continue to know the location of all targets within 10 feet, whether they are or you are moving or not, so long as they are still within 10 feet of you.

system.requirements: You are not @L[Condition:Anosmatic]{anosmatic} and the target is not @L[Condition:Odorless]{odorless}.
